thread.section_title: Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Just outstanding..
thread.title_full: Just outstanding.. - Review of Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ablasaab
title: Just outstanding..
text:
The staff of the hotel are great .super professional and their service is ultra fast . I wish I could mention everyone by name .the suite is clean ,comfortable ,with all amenities provided ,bathroom amenities are spotless as should be a true 5 stars hotel.daily twice room service with Coffe and tea provided ,with lovely touch of chocolate and fruits .internet is fast .location is great
I loved the place and really enjoyed my stay ,will definetely come back .
